desc: Moved the [Public Identity](https://maowtm.org/auth/) page to maowtm.org

Implemented a image resize function on img.maowtm.org .

    https://img.maowtm.org/avatar.png?width=200
                                            ^^^

Scaled so that image width is within +-50 of the width specified. Ratio is kept.
Created a activities list on the [index page of maowtm.org](https://maowtm.org).

![tmux logo](https://tmux.github.io/logo.png)

Wrote this to recommand the Terminal spliting tool tmux - stop opening and laying out lots of terminal windows.
title: Tmux: stop opening and laying out lots of terminal windows.
